projects.name: Onchain Bootcamp 2025 (2nd Runner Up)
details: Conceptualized 'Debtdown', a Web3 marketplace addressing Thailandâ€™s 1.2 Trillion THB Non-Performing Loan (NPL) crisis by enabling fractionalized access for retail investors.
Conducted competitive analysis to identify a 'Pre-NPL' market niche, strategically positioning the platform to minimize legal risks compared to traditional players like BAM and JMT.
Designed a sustainable revenue model utilizing platform fees and interest margins to ensure commercial viability and long-term operations.

projects.name: CUVI x KAsset Investment Bootcamp 2024 (1st Runner Up)
details: Constructed a strategic 10-year portfolio managing a 10 Million THB fund using a Core-Satellite allocation (70/30) and a 3-phase investment strategy to balance risk and return.
Analyzed macroeconomic indicators and business cycles to select high-performing assets (e.g., S&P500, REITs, BTC), projecting a net value of 25.78 Million THB (9.94% CAGR).
Formulated risk mitigation strategies against economic downturns (Recession, Stagflation), delivering a data-driven pitch that secured the 1st Runner Up award.

projects.name: Young Webmaster Camp 20
details: Collaborated with developers and designers to craft a digital marketing strategy for a web product.

projects.name: CP CUP 2025
details: Developed a comprehensive marketing plan addressing real-world business challenges.
Managed the Inter-University Affairs team, organizing and delivering inter-university events, including hackathons and CSR activities.
Managed partner communications and event operations, coordinating stakeholders, timelines, and staff workflows to ensure smooth delivery and strong outcomes.

Spearheaded a team of peers to launch an educational community aimed at democratizing access to Academic Olympiad (POSN) resources, providing mentorship and consultation to students both within and outside the school.

Grew the community to 470+ followers and successfully transitioned operations to the next generation of students, establishing a sustainable foundation that has since scaled the platform to over 1,100 followers.
